title: THROWING AWAY LP CAUSE OF BUGGS
body:
So, the last few days ive been playing ranked, and more so recently the last 3-4 days with no change that i could see to my client my client started to freeze, this is all well and good we know league servers are shit as hell so this can be expected.

BUT NOT WHEN IT FREEZES ONLY IN RANKED GAME CHAMPION SELECT!!!
I've lost my promos 3 times because of it. After the initial bans i can see the first person choose their champion then after the countdown nothing happens, ive also had games where i enter the lobby and see "Preparing for battle" before the bans have even been done so that the whole time (untill my turn to select) nothing happens. Then comes my turn to select a champion and i dont even fucking know when that is cause its all frozen. im assuming that at the end of my turn is when the error pops up saying sent an error report.
How do i fix this? or am i suppose to play bronze league all the time, forever in normals with bronzies?

replies.body:
>forever in normals with bronzies?

um, people you verse in norms are found by the exact same mechanisms as the ones used in ranked. It's not purely for people of higher skill to use.
